summary: This document is a Know Your Customer (KYC) record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his financial relationships, account ownership, and associated individuals. It includes information about his accounts at Deutsche Bank, his financial history, and the individuals involved in managing his accounts. This document appears to be related to compliance and due diligence procedures at Deutsche Bank, specifically regarding client relationships and the responsibilities of Client Facing Professionals (CFPs). It emphasizes the importance of knowing clients and ensuring that they meet high standards of suitability and character. The document includes signatures from various individuals, indicating their acknowledgment of the information provided.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary client of the bank, seeking to open new accounts and manage his investments.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the relationship manager for Jeffrey Epstein, having previously worked with him at JP Morgan.

persons.name: Harry Beier
persons.context: Harry Beier is mentioned as an authorized signer for Epstein's accounts and has been KYC approved.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is associated with Epstein's financial management and is listed as a related party in the KYC documentation.

persons.name: Brian M. Biggar
persons.context: Brian M. Biggar is mentioned as the Office Director/Business Head who also signed the document on 10/24/2013.

persons.name: Jacqueline Ughtbody
persons.context: Jacqueline Ughtbody is noted as a Business Risk professional who signed the document on 10/29/2013.

persons.name: Michael Via
persons.context: Michael Via is mentioned as a Business Risk professional who signed the document on 10/29/2013.

connections.description: Paul Morris manages Jeffrey Epstein's banking relationship at Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Deutsche Bank and is seeking to open new accounts.
Paul Morris has a history of managing Epstein's accounts from his previous employment at JP Morgan.
Harry Beier is an authorized signer for Epstein's accounts and has been KYC approved.
Jeepers Inc. is one of the entities associated with Epstein's financial activities.
The document includes details about Epstein's estimated net worth and financial history.
The document outlines the responsibilities of Client Facing Professionals (CFPs) at Deutsche Bank regarding client relationships.
It emphasizes the need for due diligence and maintaining high standards of suitability, background, and character for clients.
Signatures from multiple individuals indicate their acknowledgment of the information and compliance with procedures.
